entry.title: About Me
entry.summary: This section provides a summarize of my research interests.
entry.content:
Research interest

My research interests include, but are not limited to Variability Modeling, Software Product Lines, Feature Models, software testing, Binary Decision Diagrams, and Bibliometric Techniques.

Publications

Speeding up Derivative Configuration from Product Platforms

Heradio, R.; Fernandez-Amoros, D.; Perez-Morago, H.; Adan, A Journal Paper Entropy, June 2014, Volume 17, Pages 3329-3356 Impact Factor 1.743 (Journal Citation Reports) | 2nd Quartile

Entropy impact factor:

Augmenting Measure Sensitivity to Detect Essential, Dispensable and Highly Incompatible Features in Mass Customization

Heradio, R.; Perez-Morago, H.; Alferez, M.; Fernandez-Amoros, D.; Alferez G. Journal Paper European Journal of Operational Research, August 2015, 248(3):1066-1077 Impact Factor 2.679 (Journal Citation Reports) | 1st Quartile

A Bibliometric Analysis of 20 Years of Research on Software Product Lines

Heradio, R.; Perez-Morago, H.; Fernandez-Amoros, D.; Cabrerizo, Francisco Javier; Herrera-Viedma, Enrique Journal Paper Information and Software Technology, 72, April 2016 Impact Factor 1.569 (Journal Citation Reports) | 2nd Quartile

Efficient Identification of Core and Dead Features in Variability Models

Hector Perez-Morago, Ruben Heradio, David Fernandez-Amoros, Roberto Bean and Jose Antonio Cerrada Journal Paper IEEE Access. Nov 2015 Impact Factor 1.249 (Journal Citation Reports) | 2nd Quartile

Science Mapping Analysis of the Literature on Software Product Lines.

Heradio, R.; Perez-Morago, H.; Fernandez-Amoros, D.; Cabrerizo, Francisco Javier; Herrera-Viedma, Enrique Conference Paper The 14th International Conference on Intelligent Software Methodologies, Tools and Techniques Monumental Complex of St. Chiara, Naples, Italy September 15-17, 2015

Binary Decision Diagram Algorithms to Perform Hard Analysis Operations on Variability Models.

Heradio, R.; Perez-Morago, H.; Fernandez-Amoros, D.; Bean, Roberto; Cabrerizo, Francisco Javier; Cerrada, Carlos; Herrera-Viedma, Enrique Conference Paper The 15th International Conference on Intelligent Software Methodologies, Tools and Techniques. Larnaca, Cyprus, 12-14, 2016
